data.expected_outcome: Three orthogonal systems: DevKit for CI, Duro for memory, SuperAGI for execution
data.actual_outcome: DevKit was built. Duro is primary system. SuperAGI connected but not deeply integrated. Architecture partially realized before focus shifted.
data.next_action: Document current actual architecture in core memory
data.notes: User confirmed DevKit was built. Reality shifted - focus now on Duro growth rather than multi-system orchestration.
